article_html: Security footage captures the moment a koala visits the emergency room of a hospital in Hamilton, Australia. The marsupial sauntered into the hospital in the early hours of the morning and after exploring for a few minutes, promptly saw himself out. Hospital administrators said it was the first time they had been visited by a koala

Hospital administrators said it was the first time they had been visited by a koala
title: Koala strolls into emergency room of Australian hospital - video
